description: This source file contains functions for getting and setting SNMP-related data model values in a CCSP-based network management system. It includes functions get_dm_value and set_dm_value for processing parameter data, with external dependencies on CCSP APIs and utility libraries.

methods.name: int get_dm_value(const char * param,char * val,size_t len)
methods.description: Retrieves a parameter value from the data model based on the parameter name, resolving the destination component and path, then fetching the value via CCSP APIs.

methods.name: int set_dm_value(const char * param,char * val,size_t vlen)
methods.description: Sets a parameter value in the data model, resolving the destination component and path, validating parameter types, and then applying the new value using CCSP API calls.
